runs.comm: fullish in middle stump from around the wicket, driven to mid on

dropped second ball! Terrific effort though. Dilshan goes aerial over mid on, and Ben Laughlin runs around from cow corner, to try to take the mishit stroke, but can't complete the catch on it despite having put in a big dive
tossed up wide and spinning sharply away, Perera misses
flighted on off, driven to long off
turned off his legs into a gap on the leg side
shortish and wide again, and cut straight to backward point
angled way wide of off stump
angled wide again, on a length. Dilshan drives away from his body, but straight to cover
bouncer on off stump, Dilshan shapes to hook but ends up leaving it
full and angled across, Dilshan drives again, but with no timing, the batsmen scamper one into the off side
short of a length angled in towards off stump. Perera is nicely behind it
full, and pushed down the leg side, 144 kph
wide again, down full and down the leg side
much better. He beats Perera's cut shot with a short of a length ball, a foot outside off stump
length on the stumps, defended on the front foot.
full and on off stump, Dilshan drives it straight, but can't time it again. They take one as mid off comes around to field
shortish and wide, cut aerially, but in between the fielders. There's a lot of Jayasuriya in that shot. long leg runs around to field
slower ball on a length, Dilshan is too early on the drive and misses
poor bowling, fine leg in the circle, but Faulkner bowls this on leg stump and it takes a deflection off Dilshan's thigh pad and rolls to the boundary

slower ball again, and this time he bowls him! Dilshan tried to pull that one, but it didn't bounce as high as he expected. It takes an under edge and clips off stump. I think the slowness of the ball did him in there.
full on off stump, Chandiimal defends that to cover on the front foot
shortish and outside off stump, cut hard, but straight to backward point

almost a run out! Fullish on the stumps, Perera pushes that straight to mid on, and calls no early, but Chandimal has scampered a couple of metres down the pitch. He turns, but a direct hit would have beaten his dive
shot! Full and straight, Perera gets under it and murders it over mid off for four.
slower ball, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
way down leg, and Wade dives well to stop that from being only one wide
dear me that is a fine shot. Is that you Sanath? Fullish and outside off stump, Perera gets his front foot across and creams that through cover on the up. That flew off the bat.
and he's wise enough to deal with the variation as well. Slower ball outside off stump, a little short. Perera drags that behind square on the leg side for four. Another good shot
slower ball, length outside off, Chandimal misses with a big drive
slower again and fuller, Chandimal tries to hit this through cover and misses again
quick one this time, length outside off. Chandimal can't connect with a cut shot
and again a slower ball, outside off. Chandimal is swinging and missing once again
short of a length, into the body. Chandimal defends that onto the deck and can get down the other end
leg cutter, 113 kph. Breaks a little off the surface and evades Perera's push. Terrific over
slower ball to start, but Chandimal isn't fooled by that one. Plays a lovely cover drive to an overpitched delivery and pierces the infield
length outside off stump, cut hard into the square, but David Warner fields that at backward point

that is an awful looking shot. Short outside off stump, Chandimal tries to heave that over mid on with a cross-bat shot, but is too late on the stroke, and ends up scooping it to Bailey at mid off. Didn't look too comfortable, despite the boundary
short outside off stump, glides it down to third man
short and into the body, Perera misses his pull shot, but Mahela is sprinting down to take a run off the deflection and Perera eventually responds
slower and on the legs, turned into a gap on the leg side
length, straightening on leg stump. Jayawardene turns it to the leg side.
length again, on leg stump. Perera collects a run into the infield on the on side
tossed up outside off stump, defended into a gap on the off side

well caught, running back. Perera is down the track, but beaten in the flight by Maxwell and he hits that high. Bailey runs back from cover to take a difficult catch over his shoulder. Perera perishes again, having promised much early on. Sri Lanka need a partnership here though.
full outside off stump, defended to short cover
length ball on off stump, defended into the leg side.
full and on off stump, Mendis hits that into the surface
length on leg stump, Mendis reverse sweeps in front of square
pushed to cover, where it is misfielded
fullish on the legs, turned into the leg side
Doherty strays down leg, and Jayawardene sweeps it fine, all the way to the boundary
tossed up, straightening on middle. Driven to long on
length ball, straightening on leg stump, turned around the corner - maybe off the pad
tossed up to pitch on leg, Mendis plays his favourite sweep, to get it to fine leg
length on leg stump again, glances that fine of the short fine leg fielder
length, straightening on middle, Mahela plays a reverse sweep, but finds short third man
pitches outside leg and straightens,
full on the stumps, pushed into a vacant area on the off side infield
full on off stump, pushed square on the off side
full and flat outside off stump, Mendis opens the face and pushes it wide of backward point
tossed up on the stumps, turned into the leg stump
expansive reverse sweep attempted there, but it's too short from Doherty and it turns a mile as well. Mendis misses
runs down the track and tries to heave that on the on side, but it's dropped short again, and turns too much for Mendis to connect. Hits him in the thigh
fuller, pushed straight to cover
full and flat, defended with a straight bat
slower ball on the legs, glanced to fine leg
opens the face, gets it on the outside of the bat and gets a shortish ball outside off stump just wide of the keeper for four
full and outside off, driven wide of mid off, who runs across and makes a good stop
129 kph, length on off stump, defended into the vacant off side
short of a length outside off stump, glides it down to third man
full toss on middle stump, 147 kph, defended to cover
short ball pitched outside off and straightening, pushed to point for one
towering straight six from Mahela. That;s his release against the spinners. Comes down the pitch, makes room and hits that way back into the seats
length on middle stump, reverse swept past short fine leg, but the sweeper runs around to cut it off
full on the stumps, worked into the leg side
big appeal, as Mendis misses a sweep off a full ball outside off stump. Wade thinks he's nicked that, but the umpire is unmoved.
fullish on off stump, pushed towards long on
missed run out! Direct hit might have tested Mahela. Lenght outside off, hit to short third man, who has a go at the stumps but misses
length outside off stump, Mahela tries to run that off the face, but gets and under edge to the keeper
slower ball, tries to run that fine again, but can't connect
well timed behind square on the off side for four. Shortish and outside off, Mahela pounces with a late cut
full and on the stumps, driven straight to short cover
gull toss on the legs, but Mahela can't capitalise. Connects well, but hits that straight to fine leg
full, and straightening on middle, Jayawardene sweeps and finds short fine leg
short, on leg stump, and Mendis swings that behind square on the leg side for four. Doherty might have bowled shorter because Mendis was looking like he'd shuffle down the pitch
Almost all the way. Short on the legs and Mendis slogs that over midwicket, and it lands centimetres short of the rope
tossed up outside off, driven to a fielder on the off side
sweeps a length ball on the stumps powerfully, but can't beat the legside sweeper this time, who covers good ground
slower, outside off. Mendis cuts that, but can't beat the fielder
slower ball, Mahela backs away and aims one over cover, but is beaten by the lack of pace
gets it this time! Full, on the stumps, Mahela opens up and smites it over straightish cover, all the way
opens up again, but decides just to push that slower ball into the off side

oh deear! Laughlin just had to pick up the ball, and he would have had Mahela out. Mendis gets bat on a slower ball, and it dribbles down past his feet. There is a stutter as the batsmen run, and Laughlin just had to pick up the ball and hit the stumps from metres out, but fails to pick it up
slower ball, full outside off stump, Mahela gets down to sweep that but misses
slower again, full outside of stump, Mahela tries to run it fine, but just gets an outside edge. Wade collects, but they can scamper one
fullish, outside off stump, Mahela steps out drive that to long off
holes out to long off. Doherty bowls that a bit flatter, and Mendis runs down the pitch, but can't get under it. He hits it hard and flat, and straight to Faulkner at long off
fullish on leg stump, swung away hard into the leg side, where deep midwicket runs around to collect
clobbered! That's what he's at the crease for. Full on the stumps, Perera clears the front leg and smashes that past the bowler, and he beats long off running around
mishit, but well safe. Perera tried to hit that over long on, but gets it squarer than intended after being beaten in the flight, Warner cuts it off in the deep.
drifted into the legs, turned behind square on the leg side
slower ball, short of a length outside off stump, dabbed to third man
great hitting from Perera. Short of a length slower ball on the stumps, Perera clears the hip and smashes that high over cow corner.
full toss on the stumps, driven hard into the pitch and that bounces over bowler.
shortish, on the stumps. Mahela gets an under-edge to hit as he pulls to short fine leg
full and outside off stump, Perera wallops it, but straight to the deep point fielder.
full, and wide, Mahela drives but can't connect. Perera needs as much of the strike as possible here.
full and wide, Perera crashes that over the off side, but the sweeper can run around to cut it off
full, but tighter into the stumps. Drilled to long off
trouble for Sri Lanka, but he might just be safe. Mahela opens up and drives that past cover, but they take off for a risky second. The throw comes to Perera's end, but he's just made it.
fast yorker on middle stump, Mahela can only dig that out into the off side.
long off is in the circle, and Perera pounces on a juicy half-volley, wide of off stump. Drills that past mid off for four
129 kph bouncer, Perera shapes to hook but is undone by the lack of pace, I think. Can't connect.
mishit in the air by Mahela, but safe. Length outside off stump. Mahela tries to go inside out, but scoops it in the air, just beyond wide mid off
Mahela moves across the stump and pulls that to short fine leg, mishit again
full outside off, tries to turn that to the leg side but only gets a boot to it
wide and full, square driven uppishly to the sweeper
full toss, hit hard wide of the square sweeper on the off side, who runs around to collect
Perera's playing a gem here. That was just delicate tough. Gets inside the line of a full ball outside off stump and ramps it over fine leg for four.
Mahela connects with a reverse sweep off a length ball on middle stump, and he gets it beyond the short fine leg for four
a fine shot again, just pure reaction there. Lughlin bangs in a short ball at the body as Mahela backs away, but the batsman just ramps that over the keeper
a trio of fours! Super batting. Length ball on off stump, Jayawardene backs away and strokes that over backward point
full ouside off stump, driven down the ground. Respite for Laughlin, but Perera is on strike now.

top edged six! No luck there for Laughlin, but it's been that kind of day for Perera. Length outside off stump, Perera tries to wallop that over mid on, but it gets a thick outside edge and flies over the fine leg rope
slower ball, fullish outside off stump. Perera goes for another heave, but can't connect. Mahela scampers to the striker's end anyway and they steal a bye off the last
